== Egyptian Artwork Team ==

<nowiki>[[File:ThinkUbuntu.png|Think Ubuntu|width=200]]</nowiki>

== About ==
==== Goals of this Team ====
This team aims to make all the necessary design for the local Egyptian Ubuntu team, as well as helping the Global artwork team.

==== Current Manager ====
 {*} Current manager of Ubuntu Egypt Art Team is: '''<nowiki>[[Wazery|Islam Wazery]]</nowiki>'''.

== Joining ==
==== Joining  Requirements: ====
1. To join the Artwork team you need to know any of the design tools, no matter these tools are Open Source or not, but sure it's preferably and most appreciated to be Open Source. There're some examples on the <nowiki>[[EgyptTeam-KnowledgeBase-Art|Knowledge Base section]]</nowiki>.

2. Know Team's System and regulations.

==== Joining Steps ====
All what a person needs to join a Focus Group(FG) is a good will to make some change along with the ability to learn. To join:
1. Create a Launchpad <nowiki>[[https://login.launchpad.net/|account]]</nowiki>.
2. Sign the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~me/+codesofconduct|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>.
3. Join our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg/+join|team on Launchpad]]</nowiki>.
4. Get proposed to join the Ubuntu Egypt Art team, '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg-art|here]]</nowiki>'''.

==== Task List ====
Here you can find the list of tasks, feel free to pick anyone of them, <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg-art|task list]]</nowiki>
